description: Exist any trace from Sydney1 to Perth1.
Exist any trace from Canberra2 to Canberra1.
Exist any trace from Canberra2 to Canberra1 with one failover link, such that it must use (Canberra2, Canberra1)-link.
Exist any trace from Canberra2 to Canberra1 with one failover link, such that it must not use (Canberra2, Canberra1)-link.
Exist any trace from Canberra2 to Canberra1 with zero failover links, such that it must not use (Canberra2, Canberra1)-link.
